items.sentence: What\'s the point of patching such a big tear?
Why didn\'t you go to the restaurant with Tom?
People always make fun of Tom because of that.
Tom hopes that Mary won\'t find out the truth.
Tom hopes that he won\'t be chosen to do that.
Tom informed Mary that she shouldn\'t do that.
I didn\'t realize that Tom shouldn\'t do that.
I\'m looking forward to seeing you in October.
We want Tom to stay for a couple of more days.
These are the only rules you need to remember.
